channel.title: Productivity on Prasenjit Manna
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on Prasenjit Manna

item.title: How productive are you in life?
item.description: Table of contents 1. Do the right thing 2. Do the right way 1. Prioritize 2. Organize 3. Routine 4. Goal 5. Love what you do 6. Recreation 7. Positive thinking & attitude 8. Right Values Productivity concept is always there in my mind, but never thought so deeply. Until recently, my friend Biplab asked me the questions: “How do you feel at the end of a hard day?
